steps.title: Basic Info
steps.description: Start by adding a title for your personal data.

name.label: Title
name.placeholder: e.g. Alice's friends in past month
name.help: Enter a title for your facebook data. Additional information can be added in the next step.

files.label: Files
files.help: Provide one or multiple urls to your data, including data used if possible.

steps.title: Description
steps.description: Further describe and categorize your facebook data to help people discover it.

description.label: Description
description.help: Explain why your data might be useful to purchasers by adding as much detail as possible about your background, skills, career.
description.placeholder: e.g. Alice works at IBM and connects all his work friends on facebook She has a good network of working professionals as her friends on facebook.

categories.label: Category
categories.help: Pick a category which best fits your social data type.

dateCreated.label: Start Date
dateCreated.help: Select the start date for the data.

steps.title: Register
steps.description: Last step is to upload your data!
steps.content: After clicking the button below you will be asked by your Ocean wallet to sign this request. Once published, your personal data will be available for download on the The Social Network marketplace.
